alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:07PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Localized Flooding and Elevated Water Levels Across Interior Continues... Rapid snow melt is reported to be causing minor flooding of low lying areas in the Delta Junction area. Areas that currently have minor flooding will likely have high water remaining for a few more days. Residents are advised to monitor local conditions and take measures to improve drainage by keeping ditches clear, removing snow berms that block surface water drainage and sand bagging where necessary. Motorists should use caution if water is observed flowing over roads. In addition the water levels have risen to near bankfull on the open rivers and will remain high through the weekend. There continues to be potential for ice jams to develop as the rivers that remain mostly ice covered break up.
